summary: BLOWOUT ON RR. UPON FURTHER INVESTIGATION FOUND THAT KODIAK BRAKE CALIPER FELL OFF AND 3 OF THE FOUR BOLTS HOLDING CALIPER BRACKET TO FLANGE WERE MISSING. BRAKE CALIPER BRACKET BROKEN AND GROUND INTO WHEEL AND TIRE CAUSING BLOWOUT AND RUINING WHEEL. BRAKE LINES AND TEE WERE ALSO DESTROYED.  WE WERE TRAVELING STRAIGHT ON AN INTERSTATE HIGHWAY AT 65 MPH.
WHILE TOWING A 2014 DRV MOBILE SUITES ESTATES 5TH WHEEL RECREATIONAL VEHICLE, THE WHEEL BEARING OVERHEATED, FAILED AND CAME APART ON THE DRIVER-SIDE, REAR TRAILER WHEEL.  *TR
